Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User
  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A class defining a bank system user and functionalities connected with him.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Account> accounts
      List of user's bank accounts.
      private java.lang.String firstName
      User's name.
      private java.lang.String lastName
      User's surname.
      private byte[] pinHash
      User's pin number's hash (MD5).
      private java.lang.String UUID
      User's unique ID.

    • Constructor Summary

      User​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String pin, Bank theBank)
      A public constructor creating a new bank system user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAccount​(Account account)
      This method adds a new account to a user's accounts list in a given bank.
      void addAcctTransaction​(int acctIdx, double transactionsAmount, java.lang.String transactionsMemo)
      This method adds a transaction to a corresponding account's transaction list.
      double getAcctBalance​(int accountIdx)
      This method returns a current balance of a given user's account (in a given bank).
      java.lang.String getAcctUUID​(int accountIdx)
      This method returns a given user's account's UUID (Universal and Unique Identifier) (in a given bank).
      java.lang.String getFirstName()
      This method returns a user's first name.
      int getNumberOfAccounts()
      This method returns a user's number of accounts in a given bank.
      java.lang.String getUUID()
      This method returns a user's unique identifier (UUID) in a given bank.
      void printAccountsSummary()
      This method prints accounts' states' summary for a given bank system user.
      void printAcctTransHistory​(int accountIdx)
      This methos prints a history of transactions for a given user's account (in a given bank).
      boolean validatePIN​(java.lang.String pin)
      This method checks the matching of a given text with with a user's pin during a logging process.

        A public constructor creating a new bank system user.
        Parameters:
        firstName - A name of a user.
        lastName - A surname of a user.
        pin - A user's account's pin.
        theBank - A bank the user is associated with.
